string-array.name: whichCards
string-array.item: 2 - Two is you. Take a zip
3 - Three is me. Take a zip yourself.
4 - Four is whore. All the ladies take i zip
5 - Thumbmaster. You decide when its time to go.
6 - Six is dicks. All guys takes a zip
7 - Seven is heaven. Works just like the thumbmaster only that you´ll need to have finger up in the air.
8 - Eight is mate. Choose a partner that will drink with you everytime you drink.
9 - Nine is rhyme. Pick a random word and let everybody find a word that rhymes with it. The one who cannot hryme anymore will take a zip.
10 - hoose a category of whatever your heart desires such as cars och fast food branches. The one will fail will take a zip.
J - Come up with a rule that everybody or a specific must follow. A zip from their beverage will be as a punishment.
Q - Ask a relevant question to the whole group or a specific person. If the awser is wrong they/it must take a zip. Otherwise is the oppisite.
K - Pour a little of your beverage in the surronded cup. The person who gets the last King must drink the whole cup.
